passage: Smart lighting systems have become increasingly popular due to their energy efficiency and customization options. These systems use sensors and advanced controls to optimize lighting for various settings and preferences. Users can adjust brightness, color temperature, and even create pre-set schedules for different times of the day. This technology not only reduces energy consumption but also enhances the overall user experience.
question: Which choice best states the main idea of the text?

choices.A: Smart lighting systems offer energy efficiency and customization options to improve the user experience.
choices.B: Advanced controls in smart lighting systems allow users to change brightness only.
choices.C: Smart lighting systems are exclusively designed for energy efficiency purposes.
choices.D: Smart lighting systems can only be controlled through pre-set schedules, limiting user control.

explanation: A: 'Smart lighting systems offer energy efficiency and customization options to improve the user experience.' is the correct answer because it captures the main idea of the passage that these systems provide energy efficiency as well as various customization options.
distractor_explanation: 'Smart lighting systems are exclusively designed for energy efficiency purposes.' is incorrect because the text mentions customization options as well.
'Advanced controls in smart lighting systems allow users to change brightness only.' is incorrect because the text also talks about adjusting color temperature and creating pre-set schedules.

'Smart lighting systems can only be controlled through pre-set schedules, limiting user control.' is incorrect because the text highlights customization options, including adjusting brightness and color temperature, in addition to pre-set schedules.
